| HistoryText             = After his experiment to create [[Super-Soldiers]] resulted in the death of a number of women, [[Seth Forrest (Earth-616)|Dr. Seth Forrest]] faked his death continued his experiments, giving himself energy powers and creating an army for the [[Power Broker]] by giving a number of convicts a dangerous, irreversible variation of [[Marcia Guzman (Earth-616)|Alicia Guzman's]], a survivor of the original experiment, muscle mass increasing powers, dubbing the army the Pharmy.{{r|Avengers: Solo Vol 1 3|5}}

During a confrontation with a group of survivors from the experiment and the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avenger]] [[Clinton Barton (Earth-616)|Hawkeye (Clint Barton)]], Forrest's Pharmy learned that there was a version of Forrest's experiment that wouldn't have permanently mutated them and they turned on him. The Pharmy covered Hawkeye and the survivor's escape from the ship they were fighting on as the ship exploded, killing Dr. Forrest and most of the Pharmy.{{r|Avengers: Solo Vol 1 5}}
